title: Create a project portfolio
content:
Follow these steps to create a project portfolio in Service Management:

  1. From the main menu, select Plan > Project & Program > Project Portfolios. Service Management displays a list of project portfolios.

  2. Click New. Service Management displays a New Project Portfolio dialog box to gather basic information. Service Management doesn't assign an ID until you save the portfolio.

  3. Complete the following fields:

    Field Description
    Title Enter a name for the portfolio.
    Description Enter a description that captures the details of the portfolio.
    Owner

    Select the person who manages the portfolio (normally, the Portfolio Manager).
    Business unit

    Select the business unit to which this portfolio belongs.

    You can select only business units that are in the Organizational group.

  4. Click Save when you are finished.

    The portfolio opens with the General tab displayed.
